comments.body:
You can split this in two lines and then say something like:
```
$ sudo dnf install gc-devel   # optional, only if you use boehm gc
$ sudo dnf install zlib-devel # optional, only if you use java.util.zip.*
```
IMO this makes it more clear what are these dependencies for. 

It would be good to update the commentÂ in this style everywhere for optional deps in setup instructions.
Lets change this later in another PR, it's not related to re2s.
